metadata.title: External Resources Library
metadata.description: Curated collection of authentic teachings from Direct Path teachers and traditional sources

teachers.name: Rupert Spira
teachers.tradition: Direct Path, Advaita Vedanta, Kashmir Shaivism
teachers.bio: English philosopher, author and potter based in Oxford, UK. Student of Francis Lucille. Teaches the Direct Path approach to non-dual recognition.

books.title: The Transparency of Things: Contemplating the Nature of Experience
books.description: Contemplations on the nature of experience

books.title: Presence, Volume I: The Art of Peace and Happiness
Presence, Volume II: The Intimacy of All Experience
The Ashes of Love: Sayings on the Essence of Non-Duality
The Light of Pure Knowing: Thirty Meditations on the Essence of Non-Duality
Transparent Body, Luminous World: The Tantric Yoga of Sensation and Perception

online_resources.description: Official website with teachings, events, and shop
Free Five-Day Guided Meditation Video Series
Subscription-based video library with hundreds of teachings
YouTube channel with free talks and meditations

key_teachings: Awareness is the knowing element in all experience
Peace is the nature of awareness, not caused by circumstances
We share our being with everyone and everything

teachers.name: Francis Lucille
teachers.bio: Spiritual teacher in the tradition of Advaita Vedanta. Student of Jean Klein. Teacher of Rupert Spira. Known for direct pointing and spontaneous responses from not-knowing.

online_resources.description: Official website with teachings, events, and resources
YouTube channel with talks, Q&As, and webcasts (25K+ subscribers, 500+ videos)
Stillness Speaks library with LIVE webcasts
Science and Nonduality (SAND) interviews and talks

key_teachings: You are the happiness you seek
Teaching from the innocence and spontaneity of not-knowing

teachers.name: Sri Ramana Maharshi
teachers.bio: One of the most revered Indian sages of the 20th century. Known for the practice of self-inquiry (Who am I?) and the teaching of silence.

books.title: Be As You Are: The Teachings of Sri Ramana Maharshi
books.description: Essential compilation of Ramana's teachings organized by topic

books.title: Talks with Sri Ramana Maharshi
books.description: Dialogues and conversations recorded over many years

books.title: The Spiritual Teaching of Ramana Maharshi

teachers.name: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj
teachers.bio: 20th century Indian guru and sage. Tobacco seller who realized his true nature through the practice of 'I Am'. Known for direct, uncompromising teachings.

books.title: I Am That
books.description: Classic dialogues in Q&A format. One of the most important books on non-duality.

key_teachings: Abide in the sense of being

teachers.name: Jean Klein
teachers.bio: French teacher of non-duality. Teacher of Francis Lucille. Integrated Western sensibility with Eastern wisdom.
key_teachings: Body awareness as gateway to presence

classical_texts.title: Ashtavakra Gita
classical_texts.description: Pure non-dual teaching. Direct and uncompromising. One of the most radical Advaita texts.

classical_texts.title: Avadhuta Gita
classical_texts.description: Song of the free being. Pure Advaita.

classical_texts.title: Aparokshanubhuti
classical_texts.author: Adi Shankaracharya
classical_texts.description: Direct realization of the Self. Short and practical.

classical_texts.title: Vedantasara
classical_texts.author: Sadananda Yogendra
classical_texts.description: One of the best introductory texts for Vedanta study. Recommended by Swami Sarvapriyananda.

usage_notes.permissions: This resource list is for educational purposes. When integrating actual content from teachers, proper permissions and licensing must be obtained.
usage_notes.attribution: Always attribute teachings to their sources.
usage_notes.fair_use: Short quotes may fall under fair use, but longer excerpts require permission.
